Distance Matrix Anonymization Project
item.description:
I utilized the Lipschitz embedding method implemented by Kroll & Schnell in this paper to explore distance matrix anonymization myself. This included replicating some results from their paper, as well as applying it to a new dataset to explore its robustness when used alongside statistical analysis methods. Please explore the following analysis summaries if you’re interested in learning more:

  • Project poster (Presented at the Vanderbilt Data Science Institute Symposium, April 2019)
  • Final report detailing analysis & results
  • Analysis supplement

item.title: Oral Fluid Stability Study
item.description:
We organized a month-long stability study to observe over 40 different drug analytes of relevance and their associated stability in different temperature conditions.

The stability study is now used internally at Aegis Sciences to validate oral fluid forensic processes, and was designed as a benchmark the stability of drug analytes in the oral fluid matrix. One can find the associated presentation here, which I gave at the 2017 SERMACS conference in Charlotte, NC.

I also developed a Shiny application with R to explore study results and download data, which one can find here. I organized results into a written manuscript, to be submitted to an academic journal following internal review.

item.title: Political Campaign Consulting
item.description:
Skills

  • Strong data & statistical analysis to support Field, Research, and Communications efforts
  • Excellent communication skills to convey ideas to the team and to voters
  • Adaptable programming experience to develop applications and models across the campaign
  • Policy and research expertise to advise and craft candidates’ policy positions
  • Hard-working & fast learner to succeed in any campaign environment

Experience

Data, Policy, and Research Consultant

Wade Munday for Tennessee Senate, TN - 25

08/2017 — 11 /2018

  • Utilized R and Shiny to develop interactive map to explore Senate District 25
  • Provided rough predictive analysis to support campaign efforts
  • Produced high-quality infographics of campaign finances
  • Researched and advised campaign on Health policy and other key policy positions

Want to see my code? Go check out my Github repository for this project!

Intern

Phil Bredesen for U.S. Senate

03/2018 — 11 /2018

  • Supported campaign efforts and projects in the field office
  • Provided web scraping skills to catalyze development of the internship program, including work with regular expressions and the rvest package
  • Collected, analyzed, and cleaned data from a variety of sources

Data Consultant

Clayton Hinchman for U.S. Congress, AL - 5

04/2018 — 06/2018

  • Developed application to geographically select potential voters in support of field efforts
  • Provided general data cleaning and organization to generate clear messages from voter data
  • Supported efforts with data analysis to plan campaign & field operations
